Package index

Low-level supervised learning performance metrics

The low-level functions are designed with speed and efficiency in mind and therefore have no defensive measures against user-error. If, for example, the passed vectors contains missing values, your R-session will crash without any informative error-message.

Note: All other possible error-sources like, for example, invalid divisions are handled internally by c++ and Rcpp.

Regression Metrics

The collection of low-level evaluation metrics for supervised regression problems. All functions are grouped together in simple and weighted means.

ccc()
Compute the \(\text{concordance}\) \(\text{correlation}\) \(\text{coefficient}\)
huberloss()
Compute the \(\text{huber}\) \(\text{loss}\)
mae()
Compute the \(\text{mean}\) \(\text{absolute}\) \(\text{error}\)
mape()
Compute the \(\text{mean}\) \(\text{absolute}\) \(\text{percentage}\) \(\text{error}\)
mpe()
Compute the \(\text{mean}\) \(\text{percentage}\) \(\text{error}\)
mse()
Compute the \(\text{mean}\) \(\text{squared}\) \(\text{error}\)
pinball()
Compute the \(\text{pinball}\) \(\text{loss}\)
rae()
Compute the \(\text{relative}\) \(\text{absolute}\) \(\text{error}\)
rmse()
Compute the \(\text{root}\) \(\text{mean}\) \(\text{squared}\) \(\text{error}\)
rmsle()
Compute the \(\text{root}\) \(\text{mean}\) \(\text{squared}\) \(\text{logarithmic}\) \(\text{error}\)
rrmse()
Compute the \(\text{relative}\) \(\text{root}\) \(\text{mean}\) \(\text{squared}\) \(\text{error}\)
rsq()
Compute the \(R^2\)
smape()
Compute the \(\text{symmetric}\) \(\text{mean}\) \(\text{absolute}\) \(\text{percentage}\) \(\text{error}\)

Classification Metrics

The collection of low-level evaluation metrics for supervised classification problems. All functions are grouped by aliases and alternative terminology; the recall()- and sensitivity()-function calculates the same metric, for example.

ROC()
Compute the \(\text{reciever}\) \(\text{operator}\) \(\text{characteristics}\)
accuracy()
Compute the \(\text{accuracy}\)
baccuracy()
Compute the \(\text{balanced}\) \(\text{accuracy}\)
ckappa()
Compute Cohen's \(\kappa\)-statistic
cmatrix()
Confusion Matrix
dor()
Compute the \(\text{diagnostic}\) \(\text{odds}\) \(\text{ratio}\)
fbeta()
Compute the \(F_{\beta}\)-score
fdr()
Compute the \(\text{false}\) \(\text{discovery}\) \(\text{rate}\)
fer()
Compute the \(\text{false}\) \(\text{omission}\) \(\text{rate}\)
fmi()
Compute the \(\text{fowlkes}\)-\(\text{fallows}\) \(\text{index}\)
fpr() fallout()
Compute the \(\text{false}\) \(\text{positive}\) \(\text{rate}\)
jaccard() csi() tscore()
Compute the \(\text{Jaccard}\) \(\text{index}\)
mcc() phi()
Compute the \(\text{Matthews}\) \(\text{Correlation}\) \(\text{Coefficient}\)
nlr()
Compute the \(\text{negative}\) \(\text{likelihood}\) \(\text{ratio}\)
npv()
Compute the \(\text{negative}\) \(\text{predictive}\) \(\text{value}\)
plr()
Compute the \(\text{positive}\) \(\text{likelihood}\) \(\text{ratio}\)
prROC()
Compute the \(\text{reciever}\) \(\text{operator}\) \(\text{characteristics}\)
precision() ppv()
Compute the \(\text{precision}\) or \(\text{positive}\) \(\text{predictive}\) \(\text{value}\)
recall() sensitivity() tpr()
Compute the \(recall\), \(sensitivity\) or \(\text{true}\) \(\text{positive}\) \(\text{rate}\)
specificity() tnr() selectivity()
Specificity or \(\text{true}\) \(\text{negative}\) \(\text{rate}\)
zerooneloss()
Compute the \(\text{Zero}\)-\(\text{One}\) \(\text{Loss}\)
